14 // Represents a plane in Hesse normal form (normal + distance) for faster
15 // distance calculations to points.
16 class Plane {
17  public:
18  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
19 
20  Plane() : normal_(Point::Identity()), distance_(0) {}
21  virtual ~Plane() {}
22 
23  void setFromPoints(const Point& p1, const Point& p2, const Point& p3);
24  void setFromDistanceNormal(const Point& normal, double distance);
25 
26  // I guess more correctly, is the point on the correct side of the plane.
27  bool isPointInside(const Point& point) const;
28 
29  Point normal() const { return normal_; }
30  double distance() const { return distance_; }
31 
32  private:
33  Point normal_;
34  double distance_;
35 };
36 
37 class CameraModel {
38  public:
39  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
40 
41  CameraModel() : initialized_(false) {}
42  virtual ~CameraModel() {}
43 
44  // Set up the camera model, intrinsics and extrinsics.
45  void setIntrinsicsFromFocalLength(
46  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 2, 1>& resolution, double focal_length,
47  double min_distance, double max_distance);
48  void setIntrinsicsFromFoV(double horizontal_fov, double vertical_fov,
49  double min_distance, double max_distance);
50  void setExtrinsics(const Transformation& T_C_B);
51 
52  // Get and set the current poses for the camera (should be called after
53  // the camera is properly set up).
54  Transformation getCameraPose() const;
55  Transformation getBodyPose() const;
56  // Set camera pose actually computes the new bounding plane positions.
57  void setCameraPose(const Transformation& cam_pose);
58  void setBodyPose(const Transformation& body_pose);
59 
60  // Check whether a point belongs in the current view.
61  void getAabb(Point* aabb_min, Point* aabb_max) const;
62  bool isPointInView(const Point& point) const;
63 
64  // Accessor functions for visualization (or other reasons).
65  // Bounding planes are returned in the global coordinate frame.
66  const AlignedVector<Plane>& getBoundingPlanes() const {
67  return bounding_planes_;
68  }
69  // Gives all the bounding lines of the planes in connecting order, expressed
70  // in the global coordinate frame.
71  void getBoundingLines(AlignedVector<Point>* lines) const;
72 
73  // Get the 3 points definining the plane at the back (far end) of the camera
74  // frustum. Expressed in global coordinates.
75  void getFarPlanePoints(AlignedVector<Point>* points) const;
76 
77  private:
78  void calculateBoundingPlanes();
79 
80  bool initialized_;
81 
82  Transformation T_C_B_; // Extrinsic calibration to body.
83  Transformation T_G_C_; // Current pose of the camera.
84 
85  // The original vertices of the frustum, in the axis-aligned coordinate frame
86  // (before rotation).
87  AlignedVector<Point> corners_C_;
88 
89  // The 6 bounding planes for the current camera pose, and their corresponding
90  // AABB (Axis Aligned Bounding Box). Expressed in global coordinate frame.
91  AlignedVector<Plane> bounding_planes_;
92  Point aabb_min_;
93  Point aabb_max_;
94 };
95 } // namespace voxblox
